snippet.title: LEVEL UP YOUR BODY Video Game Trailer 2024 UPCOMING | Gameplay trailer
snippet.description:
LUYB - Hit or Box objects to the beat, dodge obstacles. Enhance strength, endurance, coordination, reflexes. Dance to the Rhythm and Elevate in a virtual world.

This game is not yet available on Steam
Planned Release Date: 1 Aug, 2024

ABOUT THIS GAME

LEVEL UP YOUR BODY - A fitness VR Rhythm Boxing Game! Put on your VR headset and enter futuristic stages where you punch and hit objects to a rhythmic flowing beat. Avoid obstacles with finesse by crouching or skillfully evading.

ACTIVE GAMEPLAY - By playing this game, you enhance your physical strength, increase endurance, refine coordination, all while sharpening your reflexes. Each gaming movement becomes a step toward a fitter and more agile self. Prepare to not only immerse yourself in a virtual world but also elevate your physical abilities to an entirely new level.

CUSTOM LEVEL SUPPORT - Play custom levels created by either other users or yourself.

VR LEVEL EDITOR - With our innovative VR level editor, you can craft unique game levels by mapping your favorite songs and melodies directly in VR. Immerse yourself in your creations and experience the rhythm like never before.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

MINIMUM:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) or newer
Processor: AMD Ryzen 1000 series
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 1 GB available space
VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR

RECOMMENDED:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) or newer
Processor: AMD Ryzen 3000 series
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
DirectX: Version 12
Storage: 1 GB available space
VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR

* Starting January 1st, 2024, the Steam Client will only support Windows 10 and later versions.
